articles.content: POTSDAM, Germany — The Gulf Stream System is at its weakest in 1,000 years due to climate change, reveals new research. The ocean current that brings warm water and shapes weather patterns from the G… [+2766 chars]
articles.description: Experts warn that by 2100, the Gulf Stream System will weaken further by 34 to 45 percent, becoming dangerously close to the tipping point at which the flow becomes unstable
articles.title: Gulf Stream System slows to its weakest in a thousand years, putting U.S., Europe at risk - Study Finds
